posts.title: Titanium Multi-Tool Key
posts.content: Keep a toolbox’s worth of gadgets handy at all times by adding the titanium multi-tool key to your everyday carry. Crafted from grade 5 titanium, it’s incredibly strong yet lightweight and is fitted with over 18 tools ranging from a pill splitter to a canister lid popper.

posts.title: Chocolate Chip Peanut Butter
posts.content: Move over Nutella, there’s a new sheriff in town and its name is chocolate chip peanut butter. When you really want to pack on the pounds while giving yourself a mouthgasm, this peanut-buttery chocolate spread is your premiere choice.

posts.title: The Bathroom Guest Book
posts.content: Add an extra layer of whimsy to your bathroom going experience with this bathroom guest book. This unique book comes with a lovely padded hardcover and 112 blank pages that will help even your most verbally constipated friends to be effortlessly witty.

posts.title: Glass Ziploc Bag
posts.content: The glass ziploc bag is the candy bowl that looks like America’s favorite storage bag. If you’re looking for a really unique piece of flair for your dining room table, stick the glass Ziploc on it and have folks ask you why you’ve got a bag — they’ll never know it’s glass.

posts.title: Game Boy Laundry Hamper
posts.content: Get the kids to place their dirty laundry in its rightful place by turning it into a game using this Game Boy laundry hamper. The hamper assembles in a snap and features a retro Game Boy design that any old school gamer will love.

posts.title: Baby Shushing Device
posts.content: Keep your precious bundle of joy from driving you absolutely mad by soothing him/her using this incredible baby shushing device. The device emits a rhythmic “shushing” sound that is designed to sooth and calm your fussy baby.

posts.title: Jeep Adventure Pedal Go Kart
posts.content: Introduce your young one to the thrills of off-roading with this Jeep adventure pedal go kart. It features a sturdy steel tubing frame, a brake-forward-reverse system, and is equipped with a swing axle and large tires ideal for traversing over uneven terrain.

posts.title: Tablet Mounting Clip
posts.content: Multitask like never before by adding a second or even third display to your laptop using this tablet mounting clip. It supports all modern tablets, allows you to add screens on the side or top, and sports a pass-through channel that hides the charging cord.

posts.title: Floating Drink Cooler Kayak
posts.content: Stay properly hydrated while out on the water by hitching this floating drink cooler kayak to your watercraft. It features an insulated interior to keep drinks chilled, is large enough to accommodate thirty 12 oz cans, and features a watertight lid.

posts.title: Death Star Mood Light
posts.content: Illuminate the Dark Side of your room like any loyal Imperial would using this Death Star mood light. Apart from its unrivaled firepower, it emits a white glow that won’t strain the eyes, and measures seven inches across so it fits comfortably on any nightstand.

posts.title: Darth Vader Toothpick Dispenser
posts.content: Channel the power of the Dark Side to help guests pick up appetizers by placing this Darth Vader toothpick dispenser on the job. At the press of a button, this small Vader action figure reaches into his cape and hands your guest a toothpick saber.

posts.title: Better TV Viewing Angle Beer Mug
posts.content: Don’t miss a second of the action when you chug your brew by drinking out of this better TV viewing angle beer mug. This plastic mug holds approximately 1 pint and has a sloped edge that won’t block your field of vision while you drink.
